name: PeopleSoft: Use DESCR and DESCRSHORT for description fields rather than record specific titles
description: All page fields with a label TEXT
rationale: All labels should be defined at Field level only. If a label is defined at the page level, it will impact the maintenance and it can generate some side-effects if the label don't describe the content of the field.
remediation: Select the corresponding label (DESCR or DESCRSHORT). If no label matches, create a new one at field level.
